    Utils class called to check validity of strings following our standards.

      • checkValidity

        public static java.lang.String checkValidity(java.lang.String username,
                                             java.lang.String password,
                                             java.lang.String passwordConfirm,
                                             java.lang.String email,
                                             java.lang.String firstName,
                                             java.lang.String lastName)
        Check if all information given while attempting to register are conform to the format.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to be check
        password - the password to be check
        passwordConfirm - the password confirmation to be check
        email - the email to be check
        firstName - the firstname to be check
        lastName - the lastname to be check
        Returns:
        String that contains all error messages that occurred.

      • checkLogicalValidity

                                                    java.lang.String firstName,
                                                    java.lang.String lastName)
        Verify if our fields that need to be compose only from letters are well-formed.
        Parameters:
        username - String
        firstName - String
        lastName - String
        Returns:
        Distinct errors message for each parameter; else blank String.

      • checkLogsValidity

        public static java.lang.String checkLogsValidity(java.lang.String username,
                                                 java.lang.String password,
                                                 java.lang.String passwordConfirm)
        Verify if required fields are given and if the passwords matches.
        Parameters:
        username - String
        password - String
        passwordConfirm - String
        Returns:
        Distinct error messages for required fields empty or passwords mismatch; blank string if no errors.

      • checkEmailValidity

        public static java.lang.String checkEmailValidity(java.lang.String email)
        Verify that the email format given is well-formed.
        Parameters:
        email - string that must match an email format
        Returns:
        error message if not well-formed email; blank string else

        Returns:
